name: AirMax Running Shoes
description: Lightweight and breathable running shoes designed for performance athletes. Ideal for long-distance running.

name: Galaxy Smartphone
description: High-end smartphone with a 108MP camera, 5000mAh battery, and 5G connectivity. Captures stunning photos and videos.

name: Ergo Office Chair
description: Ergonomically designed office chair with adjustable armrests and lumbar support. Perfect for long working hours.

name: Blender Pro 900
description: Professional-grade blender with a powerful 900-watt motor. Easily crushes ice and blends smoothies in seconds.

name: Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation (ANC). Provides immersive audio with deep bass and clear treble.

name: Gaming Laptop
description: High-performance gaming laptop with an RTX 3060 GPU, 16GB RAM, and 1TB SSD. Optimized for the latest AAA games.
